localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Beeper is fast. A single app to chat on iMessage, WhatsApp, and 13 other networks. You can search, snooze, or archive messages. And with a unified inbox, you’ll never miss a message again.
blogPost.body: Beeper is fast. A single app to chat on iMessage, WhatsApp, and 13 other networks. You can search, snooze, or archive messages. And with a unified inbox, you’ll never miss a message again.
blogPost.title: Beeper - All of your chats in one app
blogPost.author: Charlie Irish

localize.description: 哔哩哔哩速度快。一个应用就可以在iMessage、WhatsApp和其他13个网络上聊天。你可以搜索、静音或存档信息。有了统一的收件箱，你再也不会错过任何信息。
localize.tagline: 你的所有聊天记录都在一个应用程序中

localize.description: 嗶哩嗶哩速度快。一個應用就可以在iMessage、WhatsApp和其他13個網絡上聊天。你可以搜索、靜音或存檔信息。有了統一的收件箱，你再也不會錯過任何信息。
localize.tagline: 你的所有聊天記錄都在一個應用程序中

previous.excerpt: YoMo is an open-source Streaming Serverless Framework for building low-latency edge computing applications. Built atop QUIC transport protocol and functional reactive programming interface, it makes real-time data processing reliable, secure, and easy.
previous.title: YoMo - A serverless framework for latency sensitive applications

localize.description: YoMo是一个开源的流媒体无服务器框架，用于构建低延迟边缘计算应用。它建立在QUIC传输协议和功能反应式编程接口之上，使得实时数据处理可靠、安全、简单。
localize.tagline: 一个针对延迟敏感应用的无服务器框架

localize.description: YoMo是一個開源的流媒體無服務器框架，用於構建低延遲邊緣計算應用。它建立在QUIC傳輸協議和功能反應式編程接口之上，使得實時數據處理可靠、安全、簡單。
localize.tagline: 一個針對延遲敏感應用的無服務器框架
